com.blogspot.javapeanuts.jarachis.time

Interface TimeSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstantTimeSource, SequentialTimeSource, SystemTimeSource

    public interface TimeSource
    This interface represents an abstraction whose purpose is decoupling time providing strategy from time clients.
    Author:
    Pietro Martinelli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Date currentTime()
      Provides access to current time represented as a Date instance.
      long currentTimeMillis()
      Provides access to current time represented as a long value.

    • Method Detail

      • currentTimeMillis

        long currentTimeMillis()
        Provides access to current time represented as a long value.
        Returns:
        Current time in millis, since 1 Jan 1970

      • currentTime

        Date currentTime()
        Provides access to current time represented as a Date instance.
        Returns:
        A Date instance representing current time.
